projects.name: Musculo-Skeletal Disease Prediction
projects.description: Employed Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM), Gated Recurrent Unit (GRU) models to analyze & forecast MSD occurrences. Implemented 1D-CNN architecture for feature extraction on sequential data with a model accuracy of 97.19%. Directed the use of bi-directional LSTM & GRU to enhance the understanding of complex patterns in the data.

projects.name: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: Incorporated JavaScript for active content rendering & asynchronous operations, enhancing website interactivity. Employed PHP to handle server-side processing, such as database interactions and form submissions. Implemented MySQL for effective database creation, editing & management.

projects.name: Multi-species plant disease prediction
projects.description: Prepared a self-extracted large dataset of plant species with disease where each disease having four levels of severity. Leveraged optimization techniques to improve model accuracy upto 97.05%.

experiences.description: Faciliated on a research article published at ASSIC Conference 2024. Developed a deep learning prediction model with an accuracy of 97.19% for Musculo-Skeletal Disease in Sewing Industry Workers. Researched about machine learning models, deep learning models and suitable applications upon publicly available datasets.
